transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: Is this Maria? This is Derek from National Debt Recovery.

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: You owe us $3,850 and it's been way too long. We're running out of patience here.

transcript.speaker: client
transcript.text: I've been making payments! I sent $200 last month.

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: $200? That's nothing compared to what you owe. At this rate, you'll be paying this off when you're 80 years old. We need real payments, not these tiny amounts.

transcript.speaker: client
transcript.text: It's all I can afford right now!

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: Then maybe you should sell something. Downsize your lifestyle. I don't care how you get it, but we need at least $1,000 by the end of this week or we're pursuing other options.

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: We could garnish your wages, put a lien on your property. Trust me, you don't want it to go there. Just get us the money.

transcript.speaker: client
transcript.text: I... I'll try to borrow from my family.

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: Good. I'll call you Friday to confirm you have it. Don't make me chase you down.
